definitions.body: perhaps earlier mng.; Hoffm:ZAW iii. (1883), 124, comp. Syr. kmtr0 pear (Löw:No. 153), from shape);—
[[כַּפְתּוֹר]] Am 9:1 capital of pillar; so pl. sf. [[כַּפְתּׂרֶיהָ]] Zep 2:14.

[[כַּפְתּׂר]], knob or bulb, ornament on the golden lamp-stand in tabernacle; LXX sfairwth/r, Jos:Arch. iii, 6, 7 r)oi/skov small pomegranate; Vulgate. sphaerula:—Ex 25:33, Ex 25:33, Ex 25:35, Ex 25:35, Ex 25:35 = Ex 37:19, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:21, Ex 37:21, Ex 37:21; sf. [[כַּפְתּׂרֶיהָ]] Ex 25:31, Ex 25:34 = Ex 37:17, Ex 37:20, [[כַּפְתּׂרֵיהֶם]] Ex 25:36 = Ex 37:22 (all P).
